item.title: Лйнуст Олави (Саша)
item.description: Player: Sasha (she/her) Name: Лйнуст Олави Species: Goliath Class: Ranger Pronouns: (He/him) Description: 7 feet 9 inches tall, warm toned light grey skin, sprinkled with freckles if you look close enough from long days working in sun-reflecting snow.

item.title: index
item.description: Welcome to the world of Ghibalia! In a land ravaged by war, you have been taken from your homes.
